survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how travel preferences and behaviors have changed post-pandemic, focusing on accommodation, transportation, and safety concerns.

questions.question_text: How often do you travel for leisure post-pandemic?
answer_options: More frequently than before the pandemic
About the same as before the pandemic
Less frequently than before the pandemic
I have not traveled for leisure since the pandemic
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.
